name: CollecTeslas
description:
You are tasked with salvaging five mementos of the past. Gather electricity to fill your meter and power yourself through your journey. Scavenging is hard work and will consume large amounts of energy.

CONTROLS:
Arrow Keys: Move
Space Bar: Scavenge at Trash Piles

CREDITS:
Code: Bryce Williams, SyrantKing
Character Design: SyrantKing
Art, Level Design: Gunnar McBeth
Music, SFX: Michael O'Connor
